recipesJson.name: Coconut Whipped Cream
recipesJson.author: MediocreVibes
recipesJson.description:
A delicious coconut whipped cream.

S&V, but best after 3 days.

reviews.text: I keep looking for more coconut flavor in this mix, and I have to remind myself that is is not a coconut vape, but  a coconut whipped cream vape...big difference. The coconut is quite subtle and not an in-your-face coconut flavor. Very very smooth enjoyable vape. Your recipe is featured on this uTube Channel....quite favorably I might add. https://youtu.be/q23rXHJTgYc
